header.title: DFE Frame Work - Outward Work Table

ovdesc.p: This is a outward work file LIVE table where the selected record for file extraction updates as single file for each records in multi-thread routine.
DFE Multi-threaded Job DFE.OUTWARD.FILE.EXTRACT will select with the respective APPLICATION and pass it to the build list.
DFE Single threaded JOB DFE.OUTWARD.FILE.EXTRACT.POST will do concatenation of all the extracted file and updated as one single file.

desc.p: This field updated with each record of the outward file.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
